results.title: Rethinking about Metformin: Promising Potentials.
results.text_hl: The most common adverse reactions of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are @<m>DISEASE_Signs_and_Symptoms_Digestive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012817 @@@gastrointestinal symptoms@@@, and @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ tend to be more experienced than @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@.

results.title: The effects of prebiotics on gastrointestinal side effects of metformin in youth: A pilot randomized control trial in youth-onset type 2 diabetes
results.text_hl: There were no differences in stool frequency, consistency, or composite @<m>DISEASE_Signs_and_Symptoms_Digestive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012817 @@@GI symptom@@@ scores between one week Phase 1 @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@/prebiotic, Phase 1 @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@/placebo, or one month Phase 2 @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@/prebiotic ( Figure 1 ).

results.title: Microbiome differences related to metformin intolerance among Black individuals with diabetes, a pilot cross-sectional study
results.text_hl: Participants with mean age 59+-11, 58% female, were stratified into three groups: 1)intolerant: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intolerance in the past, not on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@; 2)partially intolerant: mild to moderate @<m>DISEASE_Signs_and_Symptoms_Digestive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012817 @@@gastrointestinal symptoms@@@, currently taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 3)tolerant: using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ without symptoms.

citations.NLM: Fayfman M, Gewirtz AT, Delaroque C, Blanco G, Gibanica S, Srinivasan S, Chassaing B. Microbiome differences related to metformin intolerance among Black individuals with diabetes, a pilot cross-sectional study Metabol Open. 2023 Dec;20():100256. PMID: 38115865

results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-associated @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@) is a rare and potentially life-threatening complication of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use.

results.title: An observational study to justify and plan a future phase III randomized controlled trial of metformin in improving overall survival in patients with inoperable pancreatic cancer without liver metastases.
results.text_hl: We aimed to justify and inform a future phase III trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ versus placebo on survival in inoperable @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Pancreatic_Ductal @DISEASE_MESH:D021441 @@@PDAC@@@ by documenting prevalence of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ meeting eligibility criteria, @<m>DISEASE_Signs_and_Symptoms_Digestive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012817 @@@gastrointestinal symptoms@@@ and PPI use.
